project-inspiration: As I got more interested in hacking, I moved on to a more constructive project. Using a Raspberry Pi, a bear LCD screen, a high power LED, and various lenses, I created a projector that would use an OSMC operating system on my Raspberry Pi to display audio and video content via a wireless Airplay signal. In a small cardboard box, the LCD would display the content, and a high power LED would make the screen very luminous so the lens could capture and project the image onto any wall.
project-subtitle: A projector that uses my Pi to display video content via an Airplay device.
